name: Easy Chipotle Hummus
author: JLRUSSELL
summary: Easy homemade hummus with chipotle and spices. Creamy and slightly spicy. Serve with pita bread or pita chips. Garnish with herbs and a squeeze of lemon or lime juice. Pairs well with mild cheeses, cucumber, jicama, radishes, and sweet peppers.
ingredients: ⅓ cup tahini, or more to taste
2 tablespoons chipotle sauce, or more to taste
2 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
2 (15 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, drained, liquid reserved
¼ cup olive oil, or to taste
directions: Combine tahini, lemon juice, chipotle sauce, garlic, cumin, turmeric, lemon zest, pepper, and salt in a blender; blend until thoroughly combined
Pour half of the garbanzo beans and half of the olive oil into the blender; blend, adding some of the reserved garbanzo bean liquid, until mixture is the consistency of pudding
Add remaining garbanzo beans and olive oil; blend, adding more of the liquid, until mixture is the consistency of a very thick paste
Continue blending until smooth, about 3 minutes
